name: Digi-Lion
description:
Lion - 5th of 10 art from the "Diamond Animals" collection.
Since ancient times, lions have symbolized strength, courage and nobility. Many wealthy people have sought to have them as pets, but keeping lions at home is not legal. But you can always own art that depicts a beautifully running lion.
----///----
1920 x 1920 px / 25 fps / Loop
